News.headline: Football Weekend At The Daggers: 4th December
News.page_title: Football Weekend At The Daggers: 4th December
News.URL_keywords: Football Weekend At The Daggers: 4th December
News.short_description: Enjoy a packed weekend of football at the Daggers Bar.
News.description:
The Daggers bar will show West Ham's home game against Arsenal which kicks off at 5:30pm on Saturday.

Football Sundays will be back between 1:00-7:00pm on Sunday with title challengers Liverpool making the trip to Bournemouth which kicks off at 1:30pm and Everton taking on Manchester United at Goodison Park with a 4:00pm kick off.

Take advantage of the Football Sundays offers on selected drinks at £2.49, which include; Carling, Cask Ale, Bottle Coors, Carling English Cider and Koppaberg. Please note that these offers are for the Sunday only.

These offers are open to members only. Season ticket holders are automatically members but anyone wishing to buy a membership on the day can do so by asking a member of bar staff. So make sure you buy your membership for just £2!
